name: rsh-Tweet
author: Iuhas I. Daniel

sections.description:
This plugin adds the official Tweet Button from Twitter to your Pages, Posts or Home Page. It lets your users share links directly from the page they’re on. When they click on the Tweet Button, a Tweet box will appear pre-populated with a shortened link that points to the item that they’re sharing.

This plugin is very customizable via ‘rsh-Tweet Button’ under the ‘Settings’ menu in WordPress Admin. Change the look and feel, pozition and where to seen of the button.
sections.installation:
1. Unzip rsh-tweet-button.zip
  2. Upload rsh-tweet-button directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Set up the plugin in ‘Settings’ menu in WordPress

short_description: Adds the official Tweet Button from Twitter.com.
